underlying_goal: Implement structured infographic output with template selection, restructure agent architecture by platform, and create a detailed spec with parallelizable work phases for autonomous execution
friction_detail: Claude initially scoped the work too narrowly (just template selector), user had to redirect multiple times to expand scope to structured output, agent restructuring, and proper spec format; also missed the skill reference for spec building pattern.
brief_summary: User wanted to implement infographic structured output with agent architecture restructuring; Claude helped design the architecture, wrote a detailed spec with parallelizable phases, and created a handover message, though scope had to be iteratively expanded through user guidance.
